1604040.name: Russian Pawn Store Demo
1604040.description: At this stage of gameplay, you can sit back on your couch at the pawnshop and enjoy the VHS classics. You can also see the post-communist interior of blocks of flats or check if someone has closed their garage or not. If you still have strength, visit the best club and listen only to the best music... and of course, dance with the girls. Don't forget to visit us on FB to share your experience from the demo. There is plenty of work ahead, but your comments will certainly allow us to build an interesting game together. We are counting on your participation in the project. To svidaniya!
1604040.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
